name: Flip Level Up Event
description: A project together with Algoritma and DANA. I was invited to be one of the speakers in the event, speaking about Data Protection in Fintech.

name: DQLAB - Feature Engineering with Python
description: A project together with DQlab where I create teaching material for them. Feature Engineering with Python using Kaggle Titanic Dataset.

name: KUACI
description: Create an Open Source KYC for KTP based on the data from Government. It translates people's KTP number into Location, Gender, and DOB.
achievements: Contribute to Github Arctic Code Vault
